summary: Today I learned my first random bit of Korean thanks to a reader of this blog and I couldn't be happier
title: "I'm so happy"

summary:
Adam Newbold, of omg. lol proprietor fame, is setting up a direct phone support line for his one-man company:

I remember the days when you could just punch in a number, hear a ring or two, and talk to a person who was qualified to answer your question or help you with your problem.  I think we all took that for granted, because it was the default experience...
title: ‘Call me, maybe’: Neatnik’s New Phone Support

summary: Explore how reflecting on choices and considering a shift from full-time work can open new paths for growth, creativity, and balance
title: Rethinking the Path

summary:
Regarding The Stallman Report, which I tried to discuss in a single toot but couldn't: 

I owe my career and life as I know it to a chance reading of the GPL while tending an industrial photo copier on third shift.  

Professionally: I have co-written a book about Linux, contributed
title: re: RMS/FSF

title: Pluralistic: Of course we can tax billionaires (15 Oct 2024)
